feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon except high plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon except high plus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4 except minus 8 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4 except minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
